      • configure

        public void configure(CommandAcceptor target,
                      int guiGroup)
        Method configure ...
        Parameters:
        target - object that allows commands to be sent (eg Emu is a CodaComponent which is a CommandAcceptor)
        guiGroup - gui group number of CODACommands to configure

      • addButtonListener

        void addButtonListener(CommandAcceptor target,
                       javax.swing.JButton tbb,
                       javax.swing.JTextField textField)
        Each time the given button is pressed, the target object posts or executes the command associated with the button. In this case, the button has an associated textField it must read, place into a cMsg message and pass it on with the command (just like run control does).
        Parameters:
        target - object that allows commands to be sent (eg Emu is a CodaComponent which is a CommandAcceptor)
        tbb - of type JButton
        textField - text to be placed into a cMsg

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Remove all components from this toolbar.
